column1: Who cares if I'm pretty if I fail my finals? - Rory Gilmore
Does anybody know how to study? - Jeff Winger
I can't I have to study. - Rory Gilmore
I checked this out weeks ago for a bit of light reading. - Hermine Granger
The problem is not the problem. The problem is your attitude about the problem. - Captain Jack Sparrow
WE WERE ON A BREAK! - Ross Geller
I didn't cheat. I studied for two weeks and I passed. - Frank Abagnale
In a few years I hope to have some more friends and not have time for this kind of stuff. - Alex Dunphy
Don't you think that if I were wrong I'd know it? - Sheldon Cooper
